D

DEFAULT_CAPACITY - Static variable in class ModelFlashCardDeck
Initial memory size of new array deck.
delete() - Method in class ControllerMain
Used by JDialog edit window.
deleteCard(int) - Method in class ModelFlashCardDeck
Deletes the card with the matching ID and then returns to the card the user was previously on.
deleteFlashCard() - Method in class ControllerMain
Permanently removes the card from the main deck and the complete deck.
dequeue() - Method in class ModelFlashCardDeck
Used to remove the card in the front of the line.
DoAppleQuit(ControllerMain) - Static method in class ControllerMain
This method is ran whenever the user closes the program under OSX.
drawCardPlacementGenerator(Graphics2D, ModelFlashCardDeck, int, int) - Method in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Used by all the method to read in the given deck data and convert it to a graphical representation.
drawEmpty() - Method in class ViewFlashCardJPanel
Used to draw an empty box to show the user that there is no more cards.
drawEmptyDeck(Graphics2D) - Method in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Instructions on how to draw when deck is empty.
drawFiveCard(Graphics2D, ModelFlashCardDeck) - Method in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Instructions on how to draw when deck has 5 cards, can be used later on to adjust the locations.
drawFourCard(Graphics2D, ModelFlashCardDeck) - Method in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Instructions on how to draw when deck has 4 cards, can be used later on to adjust the locations.
drawManyCard(Graphics2D, ModelFlashCardDeck) - Method in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Instructions on how to draw when deck has 6 or more cards, can be used later on to adjust the locations.
drawNormalCard(Color, String, int) - Method in class ViewFlashCardJPanel
Used to draw the appearance of the currently given card.
drawOneCard(Graphics2D, ModelFlashCardDeck) - Method in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Instructions on how to draw when deck has 1 card, can be used later on to adjust the locations.
drawShape(Graphics2D, Color, double, double) - Method in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Instructions for how to draw a single card with the given color and location.
drawThreeCard(Graphics2D, ModelFlashCardDeck) - Method in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Instructions on how to draw when deck has 3 cards, can be used later on to adjust the locations.
drawTitle() - Method in class ViewFlashCardJPanel
Called by other classes to draw a main screen on the program.
drawTwoCard(Graphics2D, ModelFlashCardDeck) - Method in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Instructions on how to draw when deck has 2 cards, can be used later on to adjust the locations.
